category.name: extensions
category.label: Extensions
category.description: Extension Commands for performing functions not part of the Cato base product.

command.name: posix_info
command.label: POSIX Info
command.description: Retrieves the basic system properties available on POSIX systems.
command.help: Retrieves the basic system properties available on POSIX systems. The Result Variable is an XML document, and can be accessed via xpath variable syntax or the Parse Text command.

command.name: linux_info
command.label: Linux Info
command.description: Retrieves properties commonly available on most Linux systems.
command.help: Retrieves the basic system properties available on most Linux systems. The Result Variable is an XML document, and can be accessed via xpath variable syntax or the Parse Text command.

command.name: ohai_info
command.label: Ohai Info
command.description: Captures the information made available by Ohai - Opscode's open source information gathering tool.
command.help: Captures the information made available by Ohai - Opscode's open source information gathering tool. Ohai must be installed on the target system. Ohai delivers results in JSON format, which can be accessed by variable syntax.

result_variable.label: Result Variable
result_variable.help: Results of the command will be placed in this variable.

command.name: read_file
command.label: Read File
command.description: Reads a file into variables for processing.
command.help: Read File will read the contents of a file and process into variables for use in the task.
